statements: SELECT * FROM employee_training_programs;
SELECT employee_id, program_name, start_date, completion_date FROM employee_training_programs WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT program_name, training_hours FROM employee_training_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_training_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC, training_hours ASC;
SELECT program_name, competency_area FROM employee_training_programs WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_programs WHERE training_hours > 10 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, completion_date, competency_area FROM employee_training_programs WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_programs WHERE competency_area = 'Leadership' ORDER BY completion_date, training_hours DESC;
SELECT program_name, training_hours FROM employee_training_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND completion_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_id, program_name, start_date, completion_date FROM employee_training_programs WHERE training_hours BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY program_name ASC, start_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM employee_training_programs;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_programs WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT skill_name FROM employee_skills WHERE program_id = 2;
SELECT program_id, program_name, program_description FROM employee_training_programs ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM employee_training_programs WHERE program_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_programs;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM employee_training_programs WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT skill_name, skill_description FROM employee_skills WHERE program_id = 2 ORDER BY skill_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_skills WHERE skill_name LIKE 'Java%';
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM employee_training_programs JOIN employee_skills ON employee_training_programs.program_id = employee_skills.program_id WHERE skill_name = 'Communication';
SELECT * FROM employee_training_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM employee_training_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM employee_training_programs WHERE program_id = 3;
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT skill_name, proficiency_level FROM employee_skills WHERE employee_id = 5 ORDER BY skill_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM employee_training_programs WHERE program_name LIKE '%Java%';
SELECT employee_name, department, job_title FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC, employee_name DESC;
SELECT skill_name, proficiency_level, employee_name FROM employee_skills JOIN employees ON employee_skills.employee_id = employees.employee_id ORDER BY employee_name ASC, proficiency_level DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees
SELECT * FROM TrainingPrograms WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT program_name, end_date FROM TrainingPrograms ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT employee_name, skill_name, skill_level FROM Employees JOIN EmployeeSkills ON Employees.employee_id = EmployeeSkills.employee_id
SELECT * FROM ProgramEnrollments WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT * FROM TrainingPrograms WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, skill_name, skill_level FROM Employees JOIN EmployeeSkills ON Employees.employee_id = EmployeeSkills.employee_id;

SELECT program_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_enrollments FROM ProgramEnrollments JOIN TrainingPrograms ON ProgramEnrollments.program_id = TrainingPrograms.program_id GROUP BY program_name ORDER BY total_enrollments DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees ORDER BY department;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM TrainingPrograms WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, skill_name, experience_years FROM Employees JOIN EmployeeSkills ON Employees.employee_id = EmployeeSkills.employee_id WHERE experience_years >= 2;

SELECT employee_name, program_name, completion_date FROM Employees JOIN EmployeeTraining ON Employees.employee_id = EmployeeTraining.employee_id JOIN TrainingPrograms ON EmployeeTraining.program_id = TrainingPrograms.program_id ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM TrainingPrograms WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT e.employee_name, s.skill_name, es.experience_years FROM Employees e JOIN EmployeeSkills es ON e.employee_id = es.employee_id JOIN Skills s ON es.skill_id = s.skill_id ORDER BY es.experience_years DESC;

SELECT e.employee_name, tp.program_name, et.completion_date FROM Employees e JOIN EmployeeTraining et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id JOIN TrainingPrograms tp ON et.program_id = tp.program_id WHERE et.completion_date IS NOT NULL;
